summary: Acceptance and monitoring plan for Proof of Information pipeline (device ledger, validator, blockchain).

scenarios.title: Device FAR/FRR calibration
procedure: Replay captured sensor sessions with ground-truth labels.
Verify Light Ledger rejects low-entropy samples (<0.75).
Validate FAR/FRR thresholds on aggregated batches.

scenarios.title: Attestation & secure aggregation path
procedure: Simulate devices with/without StrongBox, ensure Play Integrity verdict required.
Trigger secure aggregation dropout by removing 10-20% clients and ensure batch still accepted.

scenarios.title: Validator to Solana devnet pipeline
procedure: Send signed batch to validator, capture gRPC response.
Verify Solana transaction contains expected root and signature.
Measure confirmation latency and log any retries/outages.

scenarios.title: Resilience scenarios
procedure: Simulate Solana outage; ensure validator queues batches and replays once available.
Force DP budget exceedance and validate alert emission.
